BatchDeleteJobs.title: BatchDeleteJobs
BatchDeleteJobs.summary: Deletes multiple jobs at a time.

BatchDeleteRouteStrategy.title: BatchDeleteRouteStrategy
BatchDeleteRouteStrategy.summary: Deletes multiple routing policies at a time.

BatchDisableJobs.title: BatchDisableJobs
BatchDisableJobs.summary: Disables multiple jobs at a time.

BatchEnableJobs.title: BatchEnableJobs
BatchEnableJobs.summary: Enables multiple jobs at a time.

CreateAppGroup.title: CreateAppGroup
CreateAppGroup.summary: Creates an application group. The AppKey is returned.

CreateJob.title: CreateJob
CreateJob.summary: Creates a job and obtains the job ID.

CreateWorkflow.title: CreateWorkflow
CreateWorkflow.summary: Creates a workflow. By default, the created workflow is disabled. After you update the directed acyclic graph (DAG) of the workflow, you must manually or call the corresponding operation to enable the workflow. You can call this operation only in the professional edition.

ExecuteJob.title: ExecuteJob
ExecuteJob.summary: Triggers a job to immediately run once.

GetAppGroup.title: GetAppGroup
GetAppGroup.summary: The configuration of the alert. The value is a JSON string. For more information, see \\\\*\\\\*the additional information about response parameters below this table\\\\*\\\\*.

GetJobInfo.title: GetJobInfo
GetJobInfo.summary: Queries the details of a job based on the job ID. In most cases, the obtained information is used to update jobs.

GetJobInstance.title: GetJobInstance
GetJobInstance.summary: Queries the information about a job instance. You can view the status and progress of the job instance.

GetJobInstanceList.title: GetJobInstanceList
GetJobInstanceList.summary: Queries the most recent 10 execution instances of a job.

GetLog.title: GetLog
GetLog.summary: Queries the operational logs of a job. You can call this operation only in the professional edition.

GetOverview.title: GetOverview
GetOverview.summary: Retrieves job scheduling data for Professional Edition applications.

GetWorkFlow.title: GetWorkFlow
GetWorkFlow.summary: Obtains the information about a workflow.

GetWorkerList.title: GetWorkerList
GetWorkerList.summary: Obtains the list of workers that are connected to an application.

GetWorkflowInstance.title: GetWorkflowInstance
GetWorkflowInstance.summary: Queries the details of a specified workflow instance, including the state of the workflow instance, the state of each job instance, and the dependencies between job instances. You can call this operation only in the professional edition.

GrantPermission.title: GrantPermission
GrantPermission.summary: Grants permissions to an application group.

ListJobScriptHistory.title: ListJobScriptHistory
ListJobScriptHistory.summary: Queries historical scripts of a job.

ListWorkFlows.title: ListWorkFlows
ListWorkFlows.summary: Queries the information of a workflow.

ListWorkflowInstance.title: ListWorkflowInstance
ListWorkflowInstance.summary: Queries the execution history of a workflow. You can call this operation only in the professional edition.

ReadSchedulerxCalendar.title: ReadSchedulerxCalendar
ReadSchedulerxCalendar.summary: Retrieves the information of a calendar.

ReadSchedulerxDesignateDetail.title: ReadSchedulerxDesignateDetail
ReadSchedulerxDesignateDetail.summary: Queries detailed information of the workers specified by a job.

ReadSchedulerxDesignateInfo.title: ReadSchedulerxDesignateInfo
ReadSchedulerxDesignateInfo.summary: Queries the basic information of specified workers.

RerunJob.title: RerunJob
RerunJob.summary: Reruns a job to obtain the historical data of the job. You can call this operation only in the professional edition.

RetryJobInstance.title: RetryJobInstance
RetryJobInstance.summary: Reruns a successful or failed job instance. You can call this operation only in the professional edition.

RevokePermission.title: RevokePermission
RevokePermission.summary: Revokes the permissions that are granted to an Alibaba Cloud Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

SetJobInstanceSuccess.title: SetJobInstanceSuccess
SetJobInstanceSuccess.summary: Forcibly sets the state of a job instance to successful. You can call this operation only in the professional edition.

SetWfInstanceSuccess.title: SetWfInstanceSuccess
SetWfInstanceSuccess.summary: Forcibly sets the state of a workflow instance to successful. You can call this operation only in the professional edition.

StopInstance.title: StopInstance
StopInstance.summary: Stops a job instance in the running state.

UpdateJob.title: UpdateJob
UpdateJob.summary: Updates the configuration information about a job. By default, you need to call the GetJobInfo operation to obtain the original configuration of the job before you call this operation to modify the configuration as required.

UpdateJobScript.title: UpdateJobScript
UpdateJobScript.summary: Updates the execution script of a job.

UpdateWorkflow.title: UpdateWorkflow
UpdateWorkflow.summary: Updates the basic information about a workflow. You can call this operation only in the professional edition.

UpdateWorkflowDag.title: UpdateWorkflowDag
UpdateWorkflowDag.summary: Modifies the nodes and dependencies of a workflow. You can call this operation only in the professional edition.
